## Properties

| Property           | Attribute | Description                                             | Type     | Default     |
| ------------------ | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `for` _(required)_ | `for`     | The name of the tab that this panel is associated with. | `string` | `undefined` |


## Slots

| Slot        | Description                                    |
| ----------- | ---------------------------------------------- |
| `"default"` | Slot for placing the content of the tab panel. |
